*Claus' Exercises*

This website contains the exercises for the parts "Introduction to modeling" and "Intraspecific competition". Click the exercise button and select from the different exercises in the drop-down menu. Please do the exercises by copying the R-code and pasting it into the script window of your R-Studio application.
